entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
